text: 3.19 Jop 5.13, 1 Ko 1.20, 2.6 Chɨn nopun, binɨb lum awl gos teplep tek agɨl nepal okok, God nɨgek binɨb gos sawl sek lɨpal. Buk Baybol ak tɨkɨl anɨb agak, Bɨ ogɨnap chɨn bɨ gos nɨgep mɨdobun ak, gos chɨn ak ke nɨŋɨd binɨb kɨlop yepɨs agɨnɨgabun agɨl gos nepal agɨl tɨkak. Anɨgɨl gos nepal ak pen, God ne gos kɨlop gek, gon tek kɨlop dɨnɨgab agɨl tɨkak.
